title: My files got corrupted
body: I went onto  my computer one day and tried opening league but it told me the files were corrupted so then i went to my laptop and it told me that the file was corrupted once again can someone explain? like it won`t even open.

replies.body:
Hmmmm sounds like maybe the patch wasn't downloaded correctly for a number of possible reasons. Typically the client will try to repatch to repair those files, but if that's not working we may need to try a manual repair through the client options. 

In the event that none of that helps at all, we can still use the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a **Reinstall and Clean Uninstall** to make sure you've got a clean, working copy of the game.
I tried repatach , reinstall and clean uninstall but none of them worked. S{{champion:35}} hould i just delete and reinstall i really want to be ready for preseason

Sorry for the slow reply, had a little dentist work and then my weekend (what a start to the weekend eh? XD)

Hmmmm go ahead and give that a try if you haven't yet. Make sure you use the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) for the clean untinstall and reinstall, and running it as admin.
